concept.title: Agents Installed in Managed or Standalone Mode

conbody.p: TXOne Stellar offers two modes for agent management:

li.p: Agents installed in Managed mode are managed by a server, which can issue remote commands to all managed agents. To deploy agent configuration settings to multiple managed agents, launch the web console and use the Send Command menu located on the Agent management screen.

Agents installed in Standalone mode are not managed by a TXOne central management console server; instead, they are managed by the local administrator or operator. To manually deploy a single configuration to multiple standalone agents, use an agent configuration file.
